content.title: Calvary Chapel Mid South College and Career Conference and Retreat 2003
content.heading: Calvary Chapel Mid South College and Career Conference and Retreat 2003
content.p: The early registration date is past - however there are still beds available. Please call Bunjee at 512.517.0432 to reserve a room.
Want to learn more? Watch this video with more information and some video from last year's retreat!
Below is a sample of the registration form. You can obtain a printable form in Adobe PDF format.
To obtain the free Adobe Acrobat Reader, visit the Adobe Web Site.
